players.name: Bob
memory: You: "Looks like Alice was targeted last night. We should focus on gathering info before rushing to any conclusions."
Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso. We need to act quickly before more town members get eliminated."
You: "Charlie is quick to accuse without proof. We should be careful not to jump to conclusions and instead observe everyone’s behavior closely."
Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso, and I have proof from my investigation. We must vote to arrest him now before he kills again."

You: "Bob is the mafioso, and I have proof from my investigation. We must vote to arrest him now before he kills again."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Bob
